name: class02_npm-build
description: ## Questions and Feedback * Coding     * Indentation needs to be perfect all the time      * Avoid comments that label sections of code * Read the `LAB.md` for requirement * Order of assertions is `actual`, `expected` * Don't "prefill" files or functions - work incrementally * Draw out the problem domain and solution * On your own fork, fine to merge local and push (don't need a PR) * Lingering when stuck... * ?
author: Marty Nelson <marty@martypdx.com>
